alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Kendall; Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 8:53AM CST until January 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Wet snow and slippery travel conditions expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 to 4 inches expected. Wind gusts as high as 40 mph expected. The highest snow totals will be across the western portions of impacted counties. * WHERE...Kendall, Grundy and Livingston Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
